title: Teacher Training for Reflective Systematic Lesson Design: Mobile Microlearning-Based Short-Term Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic teaching methodologies and language instruction experience
context.additional_context: A course for professionals (medical/legal/technical) to strengthen reflective and systematic instructional design competencies in a mobile environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design language lessons by applying the five-stage reflective systematic instructional design model (analysis-design-development-implementation-evaluation)
Learners can systematically diagnose problems occurring in the instructional design process and propose improvement strategies using mobile tools
Learners can perform reflective practices by iteratively revising and supplementing their instructional designs based on peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
